attributes.action: Get rid of the selfie stick, stop people being self obsessed!
attributes.additional_details:
Hi there,
The rise of the selfie has become a global thing and it's making the people of the planet become more and more self obsessed, and anything else that promotes this behaviour must be banned! STOP THE SELFIESTICK!
Selfie sticks are becoming more popular as the days go by and these are making people in self absorbed narcissistic CUNTS. Please let's stop this cuntish behaviour and SIGN SIGN SIGN!
